title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 January 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:42 <CIA-123> Denis Gervalle master \* rb268ed2 / (34 files in 8 dirs): XWIKI-7006: Accessing a store that is not migrated to the lastest data version should not be allowed ...  
00:42 <CIA-123> Denis Gervalle master \* rdca0c01 / (10 files in 4 dirs): XWIKI-7006: Accessing a store that is not migrated to the lastest data version should not be allowed ...  
00:47 <CIA-123> Denis Gervalle master \* r8a02fb9 / xwiki-platform-tools/xwiki-platform-tool-configuration-resources/src/main/resources/xwiki.cfg.vm : XWIKI-7006: Accessing a store that is not migrated to the lastest data version should not be allowed ...  
02:12 <tekzilla> has quit  
02:14 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
04:30 <lucaa> has quit  
05:01 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
06:00 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
06:00 <Denis> has quit  
07:41 <sdumitriu> has quit  
08:07 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:44 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:00 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
10:03 <vmassol> guys fyi I'm going to make XWiki Syntax 2.1 official this morning for the 3.4M1 release  
10:04 <lucaa> has quit  
10:32 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:42 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:57 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:58 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:05 <+tmortagne> agent-3/4/5 are really unusable for UI tests...  
11:05 <+tmortagne> setting platform to build on agent-1/2 for now  
11:30 <CIA-123> tmortagne master \* r880ede8 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-repositories/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-xwiki/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-xwiki-server-ui/src/main/resources/ExtensionCode/RepositoryAdmin.xml : XWIKI-7344: Add repository admin UI to validate all extensions in the wiki - http://git.io/hX4QzA  
11:56 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
11:57 <+Enygma`> yes sburjan... but that's the test infrastructure with PO and stuff. I was only talking about the actual tests that tmortagne mentioned are failing on agets 3/4/5 and that agents 1/2 should be used instead  
11:57 <+Enygma`> he said that we should set platform to agent 1/2 but maybe he meant enterprise instead.  
11:59 <+Enygma`> the tests are done on the product (enterprise) afaik. You can`t test enterprise from platform. It's the cyclic dependency issue. Right mflorea?  
12:00 <+mflorea> yep  
12:02 <+mflorea> but vmassol is working on being able to run functional test (selenium) for an application (like blog) using a "bare" XE so that we can group application tests with the application (and not have the app in platform and the tests in enterprise)  
12:16 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:36 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:56 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:56 <+mflorea> ok, this wasn't the case before, i.e. users were able to edit the dashboard by clicking Edit on the home page  
12:56 <vmassol> yes  
12:56 <vmassol> I sent a vote/proposal on this  
12:56 <+mflorea> ok  
12:56 <vmassol> (before doing it)  
12:57 <vmassol> IMO it's better as it is now  
12:57 <vmassol> it removes the ugly warning  
12:57 <+mflorea> the only problem is that it's not obvious how to change something from the home page  
12:57 <+mflorea> like the welcome message  
12:58 <+mflorea> (someone complained about this on the users mailing list)  
12:59 <vmassol> the problem is  a generic problem  
13:00 <vmassol> of how to edit a page (any page) that contains macros  
13:00 <+mflorea> indeed  
13:00 <vmassol> (especially an include macro)  
13:00 <+mflorea> yep  
13:00 <vmassol> so we need to make that simple  
13:01 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
13:01 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
14:08 <mflorea> has quit  
14:19 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:30 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
14:43 <evalica> has quit  
14:46 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
15:09 <vmassol> sdumitriu, evalica: there's a problem of alignement with the new skin: https://skitch.com/e-vmassol/gs19s/newpage-main.newpage-xwiki  
15:10 <vmassol> (I guess it's with the new skin but it could have been there before)  
15:10 <@sdumitriu> I don't remember committing something that should have this effect  
15:10 <@sdumitriu> Looking at it  
15:11 <vmassol> thxs  
15:11 <vmassol> hmm jsut noticed that page conversion fails too  
15:11 <vmassol> in the console I have:  
15:11 <vmassol> 2012-01-06 15:11:55,183 [http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/get/Panels/DocumentInformation] WARN  o.x.c.i.DefaultCSRFToken       - CSRFToken: Secret token verification failed, token: "VZw4qOxbAaV4wAwxo8inEw", stored token: "PD7Jm0KpU7oxKSAnGRE03Q"  
15:12 <vmassol> so it seems to be broken by the CSRF protection  
15:12 <vmassol> it's probably broken for a while now  
15:12 <vmassol> (since we turned CSRF on)  
15:12 <@sdumitriu> Right  
15:12 <vmassol> anyone with some knowledge about CSRF who could have a look?  
15:13 <@sdumitriu> Ah, someone tried to fix it, but in a bad way  
15:14 <@sdumitriu> The token is stored in the JS, which can be cached  
15:14 <@sdumitriu> So you just have to do a cache refresh to get it working  
15:14 <vmassol> but we agree that it's not correct right?  
15:14 <@sdumitriu> Right  
15:15 <vmassol> is it fixable quickly for 3.4M1?  
15:28 <tekzilla> can i read about space and page naming conventions in your wiki ?  
15:46 <vmassol> has quit  
15:51 <@sdumitriu> tekzilla: What do you mean?  
15:51 <tekzilla> characters not allowed  
15:52 <tekzilla> eg. dots  
15:52 <@sdumitriu> Well, now anything should be accepted  
15:52 <@sdumitriu> Including dots  
15:53 <tekzilla> oh alright, dont have the most recent version  
15:53 <tekzilla> thanks for the info  
15:53 <@sdumitriu> The only problem is with / if you're using Tomcat with its default configuration, since it considers that %2D is a major threat to world peace  
15:54 <@sdumitriu> Sorry, I mean %2F  
15:54 <tekzilla> hehe ok i'm using the bundled version  
15:55 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
16:12 <mflorea> has quit  
16:16 <silviar> has quit  
16:26 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Indeed, the field validation messages were displayed well before the skin changes  
16:27 <@sdumitriu> I'll look further  
16:34 <+evalica> sdumitriu: it's because of the additional padding on input, textarea {    padding: 0.3em;}  
16:35 <@sdumitriu> Right  
16:35 <@sdumitriu> Can you fix it?  
16:35 <+evalica> not really  
16:35 <+evalica> decrease the input width?  
16:35 <+evalica> reduce the padding?  
16:35 <+evalica> change the absolute:posiition?  
16:36 <@sdumitriu> One quick fix would be the box-sizing  
16:37 <@sdumitriu> But that's not standard yet  
16:37 <@sdumitriu> -moz-box-sizing: border-box;  
16:39 <@sdumitriu> Or, specify the horizontal position of the label as well  
16:40 <@sdumitriu> Actually, the input size isn't good right now  
16:40 <@sdumitriu> Since it's larger than the form "column"  
16:41 <@sdumitriu> evalica: I'll look at it  
16:41 <+evalica> ... I'll try too to fix it  
16:43 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
16:44 <sburjan\_> has quit  
17:07 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
17:07 <sburjan\_> has left #xwiki  
17:12 <JuanDaugherty> has joined #xwiki  
17:18 <sburjan\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
17:22 <sburjan\_\_> has quit  
17:37 <+evalica> sdumitriu: I'm gonna create a #css3\_boxSizing macro in macros.vm and use it for that rule - I think is the best solution  
17:37 <+evalica> in order to keep the padding  
17:37 <+evalica> wdyt?  
17:38 <@sdumitriu> +1  
17:39 <+evalica> k thanks  
17:55 <tmortagne> has quit  
18:02 <vmassol> re the release today is supposed to be release day right?  
18:03 <vmassol> sdumitriu: are you doing this release too?  
18:03 <vmassol> guys we have lots of failing tests  
18:03 <vmassol> we need to fix them...  
18:41 <vmassol> wow 13 failures in http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/827/testReport/  
18:41 <vmassol> evalica: seems there are errors in macros  
18:41 <vmassol> could that be macros added during the skin change?  
18:41 <vmassol> see http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/827/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.appwithinminutes/ClassEditorTest/testEmptyCanvasHint/ for ex  
18:41 <vmassol> Exception in macro #displayFieldPalette called at xwiki:AppWithinMinutes.ClassEditSheet[line 262, column 1]  
18:44 <CIA-123> Vincent Massol master \* r553f7bd / (2 files in 2 dirs): XRENDERING-169: Make XWiki Syntax 2.1 final - http://git.io/ifKXFw  
18:45 <CIA-123> Vincent Massol master \* r6da4adf / (3 files in 3 dirs): XWIKI-7352: Make XWiki Syntax 2.1 the default syntax - http://git.io/37e6sw  
18:49 <+evalica> vmassol: I don't think it's my fault  
18:49 <vmassol> yeah looks more like an appwithinminute issue  
18:49 <vmassol> lots of same errors on http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/890/testReport/org.xwiki.test.escaping/ApplicationTest/AppWithinMinutes\_\_ClassEditSheet\_xml\_\_field\_u002C\_editor\_u002C\_preview\_u002C\_minorEdit\_u002C\_updateClassSheet\_u002C\_updateClassTemplate\_u002C\_wizard\_u002C\_language\_u002C\_comment\_u002C\_viewer\_\_\_testParametersInColibri/  
18:52 <CIA-123> Ecaterina Moraru (Valica) master \* rd4dec99 / (3 files in 3 dirs): XWIKI-7307: Skin and ColorTheme improvements: new colors, gradients, shadows, etc. ...  
18:52 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: mflorea said he'd do the release  
18:53 <vmassol> ok I had forgotten it was for this release  
18:53 <@sdumitriu> But he's not going to be available today  
18:53 <vmassol> he's left apparently  
18:53 <@sdumitriu> So I can do it later tonight if we manage to fix the failing tests  
18:53 <@sdumitriu> Or leave it for Monday  
18:54 <vmassol> marius should have gathered feedback and herded us today  
18:54 <vmassol> as the RM  
18:54 <vmassol> too bad  
18:55 <vmassol> it's incredible that we're no longer able to do any release on time  
18:55 <vmassol> even for simple bugfix release such as 3.4  
18:55 <vmassol> ...  
18:58 <CIA-123> Ecaterina Moraru (Valica) master \* r72f75a3 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-colibri/src/main/resources/colibri/colibri.css : XWIKI-7307: Skin and ColorTheme improvements: new colors, gradients, shadows, etc. ...  
19:06 <evalica> has quit  
19:28 <CIA-123> Eduard Moraru master \* r8fc2097 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-workspace/xwiki-platform-workspace-ui/src/main/resources/WorkspaceManager/Install.xml : XWIKI-7353 : Fix workspace issues related to the fact that the local Admin is missing - http://git.io/Y8k-FQ  
19:45 <Enygma`> has quit  
20:05 <sburjan> has quit  
20:43 <jvdrean> has quit  
22:43 <CIA-123> Vincent Massol master \* r7ad1b2f / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-webdav/xwiki-platform-webdav-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/WebDAV.xml : XWIKI-7354: Convert WebDAV UI application pages to XWiki Syntax 2.1 - http://git.io/ACxx6Q  
23:39 <vmassol> has quit
